spatial_accuracy.notes: Major plan-to-render mismatch. The 2D plan is a Living/Dining/Kitchen + Playroom + Foyer/Closets + Pantry + WC + Stairs layout; the 3D render instead shows a Bedroom area and a different internal partitioning. Wall layout does not follow the 2D perimeter offsets or interior wall alignments, and the kitchen/playroom separation shown in 2D is not represented.

structural_fidelity.notes: Some basic elements (stairs, open living/dining/kitchen concept) exist, but adjacency and room inventory do not match the 2D plan. Multiple required rooms/spaces are missing (playroom, foyer/closets, pantry, WC), while a bedroom is introduced. Doors/windows are not embedded in locations consistent with the floor plan.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture does not map to the 2D plan intent (no bedroom in plan; playroom not depicted). Kitchen and living furniture are generic and not placed according to any shown 2D furniture/fixture markers; scale and selection do not correspond to the plan’s labeled spaces.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Render is visually clean with good lighting and readable geometry. However, the camera is more perspective-isometric than true orthographic/isometric, and some architectural clarity is reduced by decorative/furnishing emphasis over plan-accurate structure.

detected_errors.description: Missing PLAYROOM space shown at top-right of the 2D plan.
Missing FOYER and associated entry configuration shown on the left side of the 2D plan.
Missing PANTRY room adjacent to the kitchen shown in the 2D plan.
Missing W/C (powder room) shown near the stairs/closet zone in the 2D plan.
Missing closets (multiple labeled CLOSET areas in the 2D plan are not represented as such in 3D).
Hallucinated BEDROOM (bed + nightstand area) not present anywhere in the 2D floor plan.
Interior wall layout/room boundaries do not match: the 2D plan’s kitchen/playroom boundary and central core partitions are not reproduced in the 3D render.
Bathroom-like space appears in the 3D render in a location/configuration that does not match the 2D W/C placement.
Door placements/orientations do not correspond to the 2D plan (notably around the dining/kitchen connection and the left-side entry/foyer zone).
Window placement/count is inconsistent with the 2D plan’s exterior window runs (living/dining/kitchen perimeter openings do not align).
Room proportion distortions: overall footprint and relative sizes (living vs dining vs kitchen and the missing playroom wing) are significantly altered from the 2D plan.
